resources.string: %s requests microphone permission
After allowing in the dialog below, you can record voice messages, shoot videos to send to friends, and use audio/video calls.
Microphone permission not enabled
Enable microphone permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to use voice messages, short videos, audio/video calls and other features.
%s requests camera permission

After allowing in the dialog below, you can take photos or videos to send to friends, use video calls, group live streaming and other features. You can also access the camera in other scenarios to take photos and videos.
Camera permission not enabled
Enable camera permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to use photo capture, short videos, scan QR code and other features.
%s requests Bluetooth permission
After allowing in the dialog below, you can use Bluetooth devices for audio/video calls.
Bluetooth permission not enabled
Enable Bluetooth permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to use Bluetooth devices for audio/video calls.
%s requests photo access permission
After allowing in the dialog below, you can access your photo album to send photos to friends, update your avatar, etc.
Photo access permission not enabled
Enable photo permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to send photos, update avatar and other features.
%s requests video access permission
After allowing in the dialog below, you can access your photo album to send videos to friends.
Video access permission not enabled
Enable video permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to send videos and other features.
%s requests external storage access permission
After allowing in the dialog below, you can access your photo album to send photos, videos to friends, update your avatar, etc.
External storage access permission not enabled
Enable external storage access permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to send photos, videos, files, update avatar and other features.
%s requests notification permission
After allowing in the dialog below, when the app is running in the background and receives messages, you will receive notification alerts
Notification permission not enabled
Enable notification permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to receive message notification alerts promptly.
%s requests location permission
After allowing in the dialog below, you can send location messages
Location permission not enabled
Enable location permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to send location messages.
